alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued December 12 at 6:51AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Watch * WHERE...The backcountry in the northern Front Range and Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...Very dangerous avalanche conditions may develop by December 13. * IMPACTS...You can expect to easily trigger a large and dangerous avalanche on steep slopes at all elevations by Tuesday. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Travel in backcountry avalanche terrain is not recommended on Tuesday. Avoid traveling on or below steep slopes. Stay up-to-date with changing conditions at colorado.gov/avalanche.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
